data.message: Want Reading Glasses for an unbeatable price? Visit my store at http://stores.ebay.com/Brians-Helpful-Elements My reading glasses are only $3.25 and less! I don't have any Glasses worth more then $3.25 That's right you can buy 4 pairs in my store for $13 as opposed to 1 pair in dept store which will be 15$.I also sell Pill Crushers,Pill Cutters,Pill Organizers,Yard Sale Stickers,Flash Cards. Please be sure to visit my store which is once again http://stores.ebay.com/Brians-Helpful-Elements
